name: Video to MP3 Converter
description: Extract audio from video files and save as MP3.
longDescription: This script extracts the audio track from any video file and converts it to MP3 format. You can specify a custom output location and filename, or let the script save the MP3 in the same location as the source video with the same name.
author: ScriptHub

parameters.name: video-path
parameters.label: Video file:
parameters.description: The full path to the video file from which to extract audio

parameters.name: output-path
parameters.label: Output folder:
parameters.description: Folder where the MP3 file will be saved (leave empty to save in same location as video)

parameters.name: mp3-name
parameters.label: MP3 filename:
parameters.description: Custom name for the MP3 file (without extension, leave empty to use video filename)
